swiper.title: Hydrating at every step
swiper.desc: Be it manufacturing or the packaging we ensure all safety standards are followed giving our people a pure, crisp, clean drinking experience.

swiper.title: Made in India, made for India from Indian fruits
swiper.desc: Offering beverages which are made from local produce and aptly cater to the Indian palate.

swiper.title: Low and no calorie options
swiper.desc: We are reformulating our beverages to reduce or replace added sugar, while ensuring the same great taste continues.
